feat(panel): Add FAZ2 billing features - R2, downloads, licenses

## New Features
- Add Cloudflare R2 integration for file storage (r2.ts)
- Add download token system with secure presigned URLs
- Add license management with activation tracking
- Add admin bulk credit feature for wallets
- Add orders tab to admin billing dashboard

## Component Updates
- Update WalletCard to use tRPC 3-tier balance
- Update TransactionList with tRPC integration
- Update InvoiceList/Detail with tRPC integration
- Update Cart components (drawer, icon, item, coupon) with tRPC
- Fix PaymentStatus enum usage (CAPTURED instead of PAID)

## Schema Changes
- Add ProductFile, DownloadToken models
- Add License, LicenseActivation models
- Add FileStatus, LicenseStatus, LicenseType enums

## Config
- Add AWS SDK packages for R2
- Fix Windows standalone build symlink issue
